inclusion.criterion: Clinically evident or biopsy-proven liver cirrhosis, without previous diagnosis of gastroesophageal varices but with clinical indication for screening endoscopy for the detection of varices, or with prior endoscopic diagnosis of gastroesophageal varices and indication for surveillance endoscopy.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with active upper gastrointestinal bleeding.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have participated in or are participating in other clinical trials within three months.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with cancer on active treatment with chemotherapy and/or radiation therapy.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Suspected or known intestinal stenosis or other known risk factors for capsule retention.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pacemaker or other implanted electromedical devices which could interfere with magnetic resonance.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has clinically evident liver cirrhosis and is able to provide informed consent. However, they have a recent admission for UGIB which may trigger exclusion.
